``` ::: ::: ## Tips for working on a team {.midi} - Do not pressure each other to finish early; use the time wisely to really learn the material and produce a quality report. - The labs are structured to help you learn the steps of a data analysis. Do not split up the lab among the team members; work on it together in its entirety. - Everyone has something to contribute! Use the lab groups as an opportunity to share ideas and learn from each other. ## Today's lab Today's lab focuses on using statistical inference based on mathematical models to explore the relationship between coffee's properties and the overall quality rating.
